note.p: Physician. M.D., Edinburgh, 1827. Elected to the Plinian Society, 1823; a president, 1824, 1825. Practitioner in Leith, 1829–47. Active in the promotion of medical missions. Established the Home and School for Invalid and Imbecile Children in Edinburgh, 1855. Friend of CD at Edinburgh University, 1825–7.
Correspondence vol. 1, letter from John Coldstream, 28 February 1829

note.term: Home and School for Invalid and Imbecile Children
